# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/expo-localization`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for expo-localization ( https://docs.expo.io/versions/latest/sdk/localization ).

Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/expo-localization
